agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Ways & Means TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, May 8, 2019 PLACE: JHR 140 CHAIR: Rep. Dustin Burrows SB 129 Hinojosa | et al. Relating to eligibility for the exemption from ad valorem taxation of the residence homestead of the surviving spouse of certain first responders. SB 288 Miles Relating to the authority of a county assistance district to impose a sales and use tax. SB 335 West Relating to community land trusts. SB 597 Buckingham | et al. Relating to a prohibition on the imposition by an appraisal district or the appraisal review board for an appraisal district of a fee in connection with a protest filed with the board. SB 687 Perry Relating to the use of information obtained by a person from the comptroller that relates to a taxpayer subject to an audit by the comptroller. SB 1007 Bettencourt | et al. Relating to the prepayment of ad valorem taxes. SB 1013 Hughes Relating to the calculation of the penalty for filing a late application for certain ad valorem tax exemptions and allocations. SB 1262 Johnson Relating to the allocation of hotel occupancy tax revenue collected by certain municipalities. SB 1393 Seliger Relating to the use of municipal hotel occupancy tax revenue in certain municipalities. SB 1467 Hughes Relating to the use of municipal hotel occupancy tax revenue in certain municipalities. SB 2208 Nichols Relating to the use of hotel occupancy tax revenue by certain counties. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
